column4: hi hw do u get all those fluidy shearing effects when u drag a window n all in karmc desktop?
is compiz something i hve to additionally install?
To get wobbly windows, simply set Extra in sys>prefs>appearance>visual effects tab
: in the visual effects when i click on extra, it searches for drivers, n then finally says cannot be loaded...y is this so?
Can you come to #compiz and pastein the output of compiz from your terminal to pastebin.com?
